Options:

C. Danny Yuvvraaj Singh meets Deven Yuvvraaj Singh after 12 years.
D. All of the above

Question: What is true about the relationship between Danny Yuvvraaj Singh, Deven Yuvvraaj Singh, and their deceased father in the movie 'Yuvvraaj'?
Options:
A. Danny and Deven are estranged brothers who reunite after 12 years.
B. Their deceased father played a significant role in their estrangement.
C. Danny was disowned by their father due to a conflict with Deven.
D. All of the above

Options:
A. They are estranged brothers who reunite after 12 years.
B. Danny signed an agreement to become a billionaire in 40 days.
C. Deven is also involved in the quest to become a billionaire.
D. All of the above

Question: What actions did Danny Yuvvraaj Singh take regarding his family inheritance?
Options:
A. a) He scammed his brother out of his money.
B. b) He left everything to his mentally challenged brother Gyanesh.
C. c) He sought to honor his deceased father.
D. d) He tried to reconcile with his brother.
Answer: a) He scammed his brother out of his money. and b) He left everything to his mentally challenged brother Gyanesh.

Question: In the context of the film *Yuvvraaj*, what actions were taken by Anushka and Gyanesh Kumar Yuvvraaj Singh regarding their deceased father?
Options:
A. Anushka allowed Gyanesh into her orchestra.
B. Gyanesh inherited everything from their deceased father.
C. Anushka was supportive of Gyanesh's involvement in family matters.
D. Gyanesh was left everything by their deceased father.
Answer: a) Anushka allowed Gyanesh into her orchestra, d) Gyanesh was left everything by their deceased father.
